scripts.preinstall: if [ -f $(pwd)/node_modules/.bin/missdev ]; then yarn develop; else yarn develop:npx; fi
scripts.ci:prepare: localIP=$(ip addr | grep -E '^ *inet ' | grep -vE 'inet (172|127)' | head -n 1 | awk '{print $2}' | cut -f1 -d'/'); sed -i "s#\"localIP\":.*#\"localIP\": \"$localIP\"#" package.json
scripts.cypress:run: yarn ci:prepare; docker run --name cypress --rm -v $(./get_correct_pwd.sh):/e2e -w /e2e  -e NODE_ENV=development -e CYPRESS_API=plone -e CYPRESS_RETRIES=2 -e CI=yes -e CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://$npm_package_custom_localIP:$npm_package_custom_webappport -e CYPRESS_BACKEND_HOST=$npm_package_custom_localIP -e CYPRESS_BACKEND_PORT=$npm_package_custom_ploneport -e CYPRESS_BACKEND_URL=http://$npm_package_custom_localIP:$npm_package_custom_ploneport/plone --rm cypress/included:4.8.0
scripts.ci:start-api-plone: yarn ci:prepare; docker run --name plone --rm -p $npm_package_custom_ploneport:55001 -e ZSERVER_PORT=55001 -e ZSERVER_HOST=0.0.0.0 -e ADDONS='plone.app.robotframework plone.app.contenttypes plone.restapi kitconcept.volto' -e CONFIGURE_PACKAGES=plone.app.contenttypes,plone.restapi,kitconcept.volto,kitconcept.volto.cors -e APPLY_PROFILES=plone.app.contenttypes:plone-content,plone.restapi:default,kitconcept.volto:default-homepage  -e VERSIONS='plone.restapi=6.13.4' -e ZCML='kitconcept.volto.cors' -e CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN=http://$npm_package_custom_localIP:$npm_package_custom_webappport -e SITE=plone -e PROFILES='plone.app.contenttypes:plone-content plone.restapi:default kitconcept.volto:default-homepage' -v $(./get_correct_pwd.sh)/start-robot-server.sh:/start-robot-server.sh plone /start-robot-server.sh
scripts.ci:start-frontend: yarn ci:prepare; docker run --name webapp --rm -p $npm_package_custom_webappport:3000 -e RAZZLE_API_PATH=http://$npm_package_custom_localIP:$npm_package_custom_ploneport/plone -e HOST=$npm_package_custom_localIP -e CI=yes -v $(./get_correct_pwd.sh):/$(pwd) -w /$(pwd) --rm node:12-slim /bin/sh -c 'yarn build && yarn start:prod'
scripts.upgrade-volto: yarn upgrade @plone/volto; cp node_modules/@plone/volto/yarn.lock yarn.lock; yarn install
